metadata.name: Charify.art Genesis
metadata.description: Thank you for being an early supporter of Charify.art. This NFT communicates that you are an awesome person
metadata.utility: What will you get?  1. FREE Mint for the First 2 project drops 2. Early access to the DAO & a flashy prestigious role in our Discord Server 3. You will be whitelisted for our upcoming drops 4EVER! And a variety of other rewards and perks in the future development of Charify.art.
